alert.note: Alert for Clermont (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 1:50PM EDT until July 05 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Clermont County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 150 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Withamsville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Amelia, Bethel, New Richmond, Williamsburg, Batavia, Withamsville, Owensville, Clermont County Airport, Lindale, Perintown, Mount Carmel, Saltair, East Fork State Park, New Palestine, Nicholsville, Blairsville, Willowville, Point Isabel, Bantam and Summerside. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
